thread.title: Lisa Haydon to star in Karan Johar's 'Ae Dil Hai Mushkil'
thread.title_full: Lisa Haydon to star in Karan Johar's 'Ae Dil Hai Mushkil' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Lisa Haydon to star in Karan Johar's 'Ae Dil Hai Mushkil'
text:
Actress Lisa Haydon is excited to be a part of Karan Johar 's most awaited film "Ae Dil Hai Mushkil".
Lisa, 29, shot to fame in Bollywood with "Queen" after which she featured in "The Shaukeens".
*Lisa Haydon*
Now, she will be seen in Johar's directorial venture "Ae Dil Hai Mushkil" alongside Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, ... Â»
